distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for crash fixes the following issues:

- Exclude openSUSE from RT KMP build (bsc#1013843)

This update also rebuilds the crash kernel module packages with retpoline support to mitigate
Spectre Variant 2. (bsc#1068032 CVE-2017-5715)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and indirect branch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
